Outreach

EOH2021

In March 2021, we will run the Mini-GRAIC Race for Engineering Open House at UIUC! The Mini-GRAIC race is aimed at junior-high and high-school students to introduce them to the world of autonomy. In the Mini-GRAIC race, students will tell us what car and controller they would like to use. We will run the vehicle on our simulator and output a score. The videos of the cars running will be posted to our YouTube channel and the leaderboard will be posted here.

Name School \(k_s\) \(k_{ds}\) \(k_n\) Car Time to completion Score Place
GRAIC Team University of Illinois 0.1 1 0.1 Audi A2     1
